title: Python Development
responsibilities:
Are you passionate about coding in Python and eager to work on real-world projects? Join our team to enhance your skills, build applications, and gain hands-on experience that boosts your career!

We are looking for enthusiastic Python interns to work on real-world projects including automation, scripting, data analytics and machine learning, and application development.

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include: 

1. Write and optimize Python scripts
2. Analyse data and build machine learning/AI models
3. Work on the data backend, build APIs, and connect tothe  front-end
4. Debug and test applications
skills_required: APIs, Django, Flask, Machine Learning, Pandas, Python, Python Libraries
perks: Certificate, Letter of recommendation, Flexible work hours, 5 days a week
company_description:
Quantinent is an Insurance focused analytics and data solutions company, aimed at providing simple, sensible, and agile solutions for the insurance ecosystem across the world to help the industry become more resilient and empowered.

The Insurance industry has been bravely facing the rapidly changing landscape in order to serve society better, with increasing competition and pressure to respond fast to market challenges. Quantinent can offer support with high-quality data-driven analytics and consulting services which allow insurers to have more precision in their decision-making. 

Our risk insight platforms allow real-time insights. Our modular software systems enable companies to create a tailored approach for their decision-making needs allowing them to leverage data streams both internal and external to get a holistic view of the risk they are dealing with. A stronger and more agile insurance ecosystem would enable a more resilient and vibrant economy.

title: Machine Learning
responsibilities:
Are you a highly motivated individual with a passion for Machine Learning, Python, Data Analytics, and Artificial Intelligence? Look no further! Zdminds company is seeking a talented Machine Learning intern to join our dynamic team. As an intern, you will have the opportunity to work on cutting-edge projects and gain hands-on experience in a fast-paced environment.

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Collaborate with our team of data scientists to develop and implement machine learning algorithms.
2. Utilize Python and other tools to analyze and interpret complex data sets.
3. Assist in building and optimizing machine learning models for various applications.
4. Conduct research and stay up-to-date on the latest trends in data science and AI.
5. Support the development of data-driven solutions and recommendations for our clients.
6. Participate in brainstorming sessions and contribute innovative ideas to enhance our products.
7. Gain valuable experience and skills in a real-world work setting under the guidance of experienced professionals.

If you are a proactive problem solver with a strong technical background and a desire to learn and grow in the field of Machine Learning, we want to hear from you! Join us at Zdminds and take the first step towards a successful career in this exciting industry.
skills_required: Artificial intelligence, Data Analytics, Data Science, Machine Learning, Python
perks: Certificate, Letter of recommendation, Flexible work hours, 5 days a week
company_description: We are a managed cloud hosting platform where teams can build, deploy, scale & manage phenomenal websites and applications.

title: Data Science
responsibilities:
Are you a data science enthusiast looking to gain hands-on experience in a dynamic and innovative tech company? Elevizo is seeking a talented data science intern with expertise in Python, SQL, data analytics, machine learning, NLP, deep learning, and AI to join our team. As an intern, you will have the opportunity to work on cutting-edge projects, collaborate with experienced professionals, and make a real impact on our business. 

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Collaborate with the data science team to develop and implement machine learning models for various business applications.
2. Conduct data analysis and provide insights to support decision-making processes.
3. Work on NLP projects to enhance our chatbot and customer service capabilities.
4. Assist in the development and optimization of deep learning algorithms for image and text processing.
5. Utilize AI technologies to automate repetitive tasks and improve operational efficiency.
6. Participate in brainstorming sessions and contribute innovative ideas to solve complex data problems.
7. Stay up-to-date on the latest trends and advancements in the field of data science and AI. 

If you are passionate about leveraging data to drive business growth and are eager to learn and grow in a fast-paced environment, we want to hear from you! Join us at Elevizo and take your data science skills to the next level. Apply now!
skills_required: Artificial intelligence, Data Analytics, Data Science, Deep Learning, Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing (NLP), Python, SQL
perks: Certificate, Letter of recommendation, Flexible work hours, 5 days a week
company_description: Elevazo is your smart career companion, leveraging the power of AI to help job seekers stand out and succeed. From crafting ATS-friendly, tailored resumes to optimizing LinkedIn profiles and tracking job applications, Elevazo makes the entire job search journey faster, smarter, and more effective.

title: Business Strategy
responsibilities:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include: 

1. Lead outreach to top researchers and experts by identifying relevant individuals, crafting personalized messages, and managing follow-ups to ensure high-quality responses to our survey initiative.
2. Support marketing and social media efforts, including drafting and scheduling posts, tracking engagement, and contributing to growth strategies across platforms like X (Twitter), LinkedIn, and Telegram.
3. Assist in research and ecosystem mapping.
skills_required: Digital Marketing, English Proficiency (Spoken), English Proficiency (Written), Machine Learning, Research and Analytics
other_requirements:
1. Candidates with academic or project experience in artificial intelligence, machine learning, or general computer science will find this role especially rewarding.                

                    2. Candidates are genuinely excited to explore how AI tools can enhance marketing, content creation, outreach, and automation, from prompt engineering to smart audience targeting.                

                    3. Experience in ChatGPT, Notion AI, Midjourney, Figma AI plugins, or marketing automation platforms (e.g., HubSpot, Clay, or Zapier).
perks: Certificate, Letter of recommendation, Flexible work hours, 5 days a week
company_description:
SoraChain AI is building the infrastructure to enable privacy-preserving, decentralized AI training at a global scale. At the intersection of Federated Learning and Blockchain, we're pioneering a system where data and compute are coordinated trustlessly   empowering edge devices, data silos, and decentralized compute to collaboratively train powerful models without compromising security or ownership.

Our mission is to democratize access to AI by creating open, verifiable, and scalable foundations for the next wave of intelligent applications.
